/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the life and activity in the area. In the distance, a large building with a curved roof stands out, its unique architecture a testament to the city's modern design. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, completing the picturesque view of this worldwide landmark.
